answers.answer: Thank you. Congrats...u made it. Welcome to baby marcus n enjoy motherhood. Best of luck

question: Long story short... High blood pressure was the first sign.  Then went to a headache. Go with your gut instinct. Get checked for preeclampsia. Put me and baby in danger. I was tested positive for it and had a rough but successful pregnancy. Baby Marcus arrived yesterday night at 10:03. 8lbs 10oz. 21Inches. This was my first pregnancy and this app has really been informative. Good luck to all!
title: Baby arrived March 27
